title: Moovy
description: To help movie lovers discover new and exciting movies, Moovy allows users to filter movies by category, search for movies, find new, popular as well as top rated movies. Users can also  the movie rating, short description, and movie cast.

title: Sevapp
description: In order to stimulate circular economy Sevapp is developed to encourage donation and the reuse of items. Users can donate items they no longer need to other users or organizations that request those items. Sevapp has a messaging system that makes donating easy.

title: Been
description: Been allows travelers to discover amazing travel locations worldwide, see where their friends have traveled, and read about their experiences and discoveries on vacations. Been is a prototype landing page for travel social network.
